workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.022264489583713853 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4995437176284028 --weight-decay 0.0006981492998071611 --lr 1e-9 --lr-scheduler triangular --min-lr 1e-10 --max-lr 0.0006951959882448914 --lr-period-updates 85246.84209136928 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.043804414306718734 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
